Other:
- Rope climb speed increased from 11 to 13
- Rope activation range increased from 2.2m to 2.4m
- Fixed an HTML parsing exploit with builds

- {{Icon|Flame Dash}} Flame Dash now has 30% Slow Resistance

- Spirit Power DPS scaling reduced from 0.8 to 0.7

- {{Icon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch T2 damage from +50 to +35

- {{Icon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch now knocks people less high into the air
